converse.line: Tell me. Why did you raise me from the dead?
To give you a chance. To be able to shine in the world like you were destined. But you were so cruelly robbed of this.
So now you're going to take that away from me?
Listen to me, daughter of the sun...
You have done well. Lived your life as it was fated to be. Your flame was given a chance to burn in this world. Why are you not pleased?
I don't want illusions! If you're going to take away it all, why do it in the first place? Why not let me live here in peace forever?
Ah... I can feel it in the orbs. You did not spend enough time living through this world.
You only collected the orbs in search of knowledge, did you not? And now that very knowledge you yearned for has turned into ignorance and hatred.
That's not true! I collected the orbs because I loved to help people. I'm just angry that you hid the truth from me and now you're taking everything away.
Child of light, I can't let you stay here. Nothing lasts forever. Your flame has reached the end of the wick.
Your soul needs rest. Your life now has some happy memories to it that the people of Naibu will never forget.
Rest in Peace.
No, I'm not ready to--
Was it not enough to help all those people? Was it all just so that you could gain some orbs and solve a mystery?
I... I see.
You know, you're right. I shouldn't focus on all the negatives. At least I'd been given a chance to live a full life helping others in this wonderful dream paradise.
Ah... I can feel it in the orbs. You loved your time here and cherished the people and places you met. I am pleased.
However, child of light, I can't let you stay here. Nothing lasts forever. Your flame has reached the end of the wick.
Your soul needs rest. Your life now has some happy memories to it that the people of Naibu will never forget.
Rest in Peace.
Thank you.
